uploader.title: Click to Upload Or Drag a File!

export.title: How to Export Chats
export.security: This site does not track you in any way, all the procesing is done on your device.
android-steps: 1. Open the individual or group chat.
2. Tap More options ➔ More ➔ Export chat.
3. Choose whether to export with media or without media.
4. Choose where to save your files. (If you have a file explorer app installed on your phone save it using the explorer and then import)
ios-steps: 1. Open the individual or group chat you’d like to save.
2. Tap the contact's name or group subject.
4. Select if you want to Attach Media or email the chat Without Media.
5. Open the file explorer app. (You can also tap More for additional options.)

meta.description: Import your WhatsApp chat to view cool stats!
